#BlackMagicCraft #Episode204 #epicfail

Sometimes things do not go according to plans. This was one of those times.....trying to make a beautiful scenic base for this Tiger Monk miniature, I instead made a hot mess. Thankfully the actual mini turned out really nice!

Check out The DRAGON TRAPPER'S LODGE
https://www.patreon.com/dragontrapperslodge

They also have previous models available for individual purchase at: https://bit.ly/DragonTrappersLodge

Additional painted model photos by SinNerds Miniature Painting:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCiimawUOQGftTTx4dXG6YxA

Thanks Geek Gaming Scenics for the awesome base ready materials
https://www.geekgaming.co.uk/

Mini was printed on my Anycubic Photon Printer

BUY an Anycubic Photon
(USA) https://amzn.to/38uFJuY
(Canada) https://amzn.to/2EaApyY
(UK) https://amzn.to/38uItsb

title: One bad decision ruined the nicest base I've ever made | Tiger Monk
